channel.title: Devolution Drops?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to make Drop's for devolution.
[code]npcdrop = 86 1309 1 30 //Rat drop/Iron 2handed/1 of it/30% chance drop. npcdrop = 86 1153 1 31 //Rat drop/Iron full helm/1 of it/31% chance drop. npcdrop = 86 1191 1 32 //Rat drop/Iron Kite/1 of it/32% chance drop. npcdrop = 86 1115 1 33 //Rat drop/Iron Plate/1 of it/33% chance drop. npcdrop = 86 1067 1 34 //Rat drop/Iron Legs/1 of it/34% chance drop. npcdrop = 86 995 15 100 //Rat drop/coins/15 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 86 526 1 100 //Rat drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop.[/code]
Thats what i got so far, Can someone tell me what each part mean's. All rep you +

item.title: Devolution Drops?
item.dc:creator: @bbrrii1 bbrrii1
item.description:
@bbrrii1 wrote:

npcdrop = 86 1309 1 30 //Rat drop/Iron 2handed/1 of it/30% chance drop.

^^thats the first line^^ ^^read this, it tells u exactly wut it means, lol^^

86 is the rats id.
1309 is the id for iron 2h sword
1 means it’ll drop 1 of it
and the 30 means there is a 30% chance

so if u wanted the rat to drop 1 santa at a 20% chance u would put:

npcdrop = 86	1050	1	20         //Rat drop/santa/1 of it/20% chance drop.

btw, the part that says “//Rat drop/santa/1 of it/20% chance drop.” doesnt matter, u dont have to have it, but to keep organized i put it.

Read full topic
